product_name: Grande CosmeticsGrandeREVIVE Brightening Eye Cream with Wrinkle Defense
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeBright, tight & blocking blue light! GrandeREVIVE Brightening Eye Cream with Wrinkle Defense by Grande Cosmetics is a lightweight, hydrating and illuminating eye cream to reduce the look of fine lines, dark circles and under eye puffiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsPeptide-infused eye cream for a younger, brighter, hydrated appearanceReduces the look of dark circles & helps to depuff under eye areaFormulated with Matrixyl 3000 to decrease the look of fine lines & wrinklesHelps protect the skin against blue lightFeatures an easy-to-use silicone applicator for targeted applicationDermatologist testedKey IngredientsMatrixyl 3000: A powerhouse peptide complex that decreases the look of wrinkles while visibly improving tone & elasticity over timeAloe Vera: Deeply moisturizes to visibly relieve swelling & puffinessHelianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil: Being very high in vitamin E, it acts as an emollient which helps to trap moisture & maintain hydration; it also helps prevent damage caused by blue light & aids against premature aging of skin by helping to protect collagen and elastin contentRhodiola Rosea Root Extract: Helps to increase circulation & cell turnover, reducing the appearance of fine linesPopulus Tremuloides (Aspen) Bark Extract: An antioxidant that promotes smoothness & helps to calm the skinPine (Pinus Pinaster) Bark Extract: a maritime pine native to the Mediterranean region, helps to shield the skin from damage caused by everyday environmental oxidative stresses and reduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation for a brighter appearance.Research Results95% of users felt it hydrated the eye area*93% of users felt it reduced the look of fine lines & wrinkles*93% of users felt it was easy to apply*91% of users felt it brightened the eye area**Based on a 28 day consumer study on 30 subjects. Results will vary.Item 2587555How To UseSlowly twist the bottom of the GrandeREVIVE bottle to fill the hygienic brush applicator with product. Use the brush to apply a small amount to clean, dry under eye. Gently blend in using the brush or tap with your fingers around your entire eye area. For maximum results, apply twice daily in the morning and evening.Pro Tip: You may need to twist the bottom of the GrandeREVIVE bottle more times than expected for your first use. Then, the bottle will be primed for future applications and only 1-2 twists will be necessary from then on! Be sure not to over-twist after your first use.IngredientsAloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Betaine, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Cetearyl Wheat Straw Glycosides, Water/Aqua/Eau, Alcohol, Althaea Officinalis Leaf/Root Extract, Borago Officinalis Seed Extract, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Diglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Hexapeptide-11, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, P-Anisic Acid, Pinus Pinaster Bark/Bud Extract, Polysorbate 20, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Propylene Glycol, Rhodiola Rosea Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lactate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Methylparaben, Potassium Sorbate, Propylparaben, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Slowly twist the bottom of the GrandeREVIVE bottle to fill the hygienic brush applicator with product. Use the brush to apply a small amount to clean, dry under eye. Gently blend in using the brush or tap with your fingers around your entire eye area. For maximum results, apply twice daily in the morning and evening.Pro Tip: You may need to twist the bottom of the GrandeREVIVE bottle more times than expected for your first use. Then, the bottle will be primed for future applications and only 1-2 twists will be necessary from then on! Be sure not to over-twist after your first use.

reviews.headline: Great product! Received Expired product ;(
reviews.comments:
I have used this product ever since it came out on the market and has really worked for me. It has made significant change to my eyes getting rid of the dark circles and giving a bright glow to the eye in general.  Has diminished the look of the crows feet on the side eye.  I like the way the eye looks after massaging it alongside the Foreo Iris, they sure complement each other.  
Sadly I received an expired product from Ulta in mid- February.  I recently finished my previous product.  When I opened the new  one it had a weird color and odd smell. Not until i actually saw the bottom that I noticed that the expiration date was from 2 years ago !!! Definately check the expiration dates ;/

reviews.headline: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
reviews.comments: I purchased this online at Ulta and just couldn't wait to start using it, I absolutely love the Grande Lash-MD serum and it works like no other's I have tried. So I had really high hopes for this eye cream but unfortunately I wasted 40 bucks! It does not rub or pat into the skin at all, it simply moves all around my eyes with little to no absorption, I have to assume a little must soak it hours after I go to bed, But in the AM I can't wait hours to do my routine so I don't use in the morning anymore. Also the twist brush dispenser wastes product, I do NOT over twist and use all the product on the brush but every time when I use it again it has dried up cream inside and the top of the brush. I have stored it standing up right, laying down but it oozes out when I'm done and put the cover back on.

reviews.headline: meh
reviews.comments: this isn't a bad eye cream, but not particularly good, either. it moisturizes just fine, but it sits terribly under makeup, does not really have any additional benefits and the packaging is annoying. if someone were to gift this to me, i'd definitely use it, but i would not again spend money on it. many cheaper drugstore options do the same thing.

reviews.headline: Really love this product!
reviews.comments: I am a huge fan of few of grande's products & this is no exception. I've tried several eye creams and just really love this one. It definitely brightens up my under eyes. The packaging is also a huge plus for me, I think it's innovative and it's great you don't need your fingers to apply.

reviews.headline: RUN DON'T WALK FOR THIS EYECREAM!!
reviews.comments: I LOVE Grande in general and Revive is no exception! It is super easy to apply morning and night giving a nice sensation.  My old eye creams all required me to stick my finger in a jar, love this brush and how easy it is to apply!

reviews.headline: Another fail
reviews.comments: No results, whatsoever.  Not sure what the true claim on this eye cream is, but does not provide any benefits.  Made my eyes water.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love this brand A LOT!!! I use a lot of products and this eye cream is everything! A little goes a long way and it brightens up my eye area a lot! I've noticed a different around my eye area! I do use it on top and bottom!

reviews.headline: Different Ingredients Than on Site
reviews.comments:
I ordered this with the half off promo.  I bought it for the ingredients listed on the site.  The actual ingredients on the product are vastly different than what was advertised.

The one I received has ingredients like parabens, something I avoid due to health risks.

reviews.headline: Review the Product, not the packaging
reviews.comments: I cannot believe someone actually rated this 1 star based on the packaging and not the product itself. I mean, I can see maybe taking off 1 star if the packaging is bad. But certainly not 4 stars.

reviews.headline: CAN NOT READ PACKAGING!!
reviews.comments:
White script on yellow background-- REALLY GRANDE!!
Not even with a magnifying glass can you make out what is suppose to be your primary presentation!!  Why bother in knowing the quality & effectiveness of product if Company does not care about your visual!!!!

reviews.headline: Love GrandeREVIVE!
reviews.comments: This eye cream feels so luxurious on my skin. I like how with the componentry, you do not have to touch your eyes to apply it. Tugging and pulling on the undereye is the #1 cause of wrinkles, and I do not need anymore of those haha! My undereye feel smooth and more bright. Love it!

faceoff_positive.comments: I HAD wrinkles and puffy eyes! This product has the efficiency of medical grade eye products but costs less! The applicator is so easy to use and helpful to apply just the right amount with no wastage. It's a MUST HAVE eye product. It's perfect for any skin and leaves no reside or oiliness! Thank You GRANDE for another winner! I'd love to see a face cream as well!
faceoff_positive.headline: You Need This!

faceoff_negative.comments: I purchased this online at Ulta and just couldn't wait to start using it, I absolutely love the Grande Lash-MD serum and it works like no other's I have tried. So I had really high hopes for this eye cream but unfortunately I wasted 40 bucks! It does not rub or pat into the skin at all, it simply moves all around my eyes with little to no absorption, I have to assume a little must soak it hours after I go to bed, But in the AM I can't wait hours to do my routine so I don't use in the morning anymore. Also the twist brush dispenser wastes product, I do NOT over twist and use all the product on the brush but every time when I use it again it has dried up cream inside and the top of the brush. I have stored it standing up right, laying down but it oozes out when I'm done and put the cover back on.
faceoff_negative.headline: NOT WORTH THE MONEY

rollup.name: GrandeREVIVE Brightening Eye Cream with Wrinkle Defense
